name: Bangoo
description:
Bangoo

In this game you have to help a cute square called "Bangoo" to get the key and jump into the yellow box to pass levels.

This is my first game that has physics in it so I would be happy if you leave a comment about how your experience was.

Music:

Music in the game by:  @king_amir37

Music in the menu and at the end by: iliaabbasi
